plan.prd_item_title: Document the task source contract (file now, API later)

data.description: Write down the minimal request/response contract for a task source so the orchestrator can later fetch tasks from the Go backend.
acceptance_criteria: Contract includes required fields (id, type, data)
Contract includes optional fields and how they map to queue entries

data.description: Ensure task validation logic is aligned with the documented contract and fails fast with clear errors.
acceptance_criteria: Invalid tasks file is rejected with actionable error
Valid tasks file loads with correct task count
